channel.title: Daily on AVinCapital
channel.description: Recent content in Daily on AVinCapital

item.title: The Vietnam Daily Highlights 17/02/2017
item.description: The market saw some nice gains today to go along with a few losses for selected bluechips. Market breadth was quite narrow and we saw 28 stocks hit the ceiling while 20 stocks fell to the floor. Foreigners were somewhat less active today with much more selling than buying.
